name: Djezzy Algeria
description: Developed a customer service app as a solo React Native developer for Djezzy, a leading telecom provider in Algeria.
Handled features like mobile recharges, plan activations, and support requests.
Implemented end-to-end API integration and delivered milestones in coordination with QA and product teams.

name: Viva Apps – Smartfren, Indonesia
description: Contributed to a customer-facing telecom app for Smartfren.
Implemented services like wallet balance retrieval, recharge workflows, and localization.
Resolved key production crashes via Play Console analysis, improving app stability by over 30%.
Supported smooth release cycles in coordination with cross-functional teams.

name: Ooredoo Qatar
description: Developing a cross-platform mobile app to enhance customer engagement and service access.
Integrated POS features like printing, scanning, and NFC for secure interactions.
Optimized performance, reducing app startup time by ~25%.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to deliver stable feature releases.

name: Sales Networking App – Airtel, Sri Lanka
description: Worked on a sales management app for Airtel Sri Lanka's on-ground teams.
Enabled real-time sync, agent performance tracking, and hierarchical reporting.
Built custom UI components and assisted with App Store deployment for release compliance.
